unittitle_ssm: Hopewell Society of Brooklyn annual reports and publications
abstract_ssm: The Hopewell Society of Brooklyn annual reports and publications span the period 1871 to 1945. Annual reports of the Society feature summary information of the Society's yearly activities, in addition to lists of officers, managers, and committees; the Society's certificate of incorporation, constitution, and bylaws; lists of contributions and donations; and other information.
